free_text.Learning outcomes: This course is an academic course that prepares PhD students to do research in entrepreneurship.  It is not intended for students who wish to start companies.  In the course, we cover the classic works of entrepreneurship theory, with an emphasis on top management teams and venture capital teams.
free_text.Content: [li]Upper echelons theory[br/][li]Group theory and group dynamics[br/][li]Task & relationship conflict[br/][li]Team potency

free_text.Contenu: [li]Upper echelons theory[br/][li]Group theory and group dynamics[br/][li]Task & relationship conflict[br/][li]Team potency
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: This course is an academic course that prepares PhD students to do research in entrepreneurship.  It is not intended for students who wish to start companies.  In the course, we cover the classic works of entrepreneurship theory, with an emphasis on top management teams and venture capital teams.
